mapper.select: SELECT c.id, d.custom_name, a.shop_name, a.shop_price, b.staff_name, e.typename, b.staff_depart FROM tb_shop a, tb_staff b, tb_order c, tb_custom d, tb_shoptype e WHERE c.staff_id = b.id AND c.shop_id= a.id AND c.custom_id = d.id and b.staff_shop_type=e.id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_order(custom_id, shop_id, staff_id, create_time) VALUE (#{custom_id}, #{shop_id}, #{staff_id}, #{create_time})
